Text:
Framerate stutters at 25:04, 32:43, 42:34, and 1:53:08 for several seconds.

Similar problem with "Hereafter" and "The Next Three Days" BRRips by Release-Lounge.  All have glitchy spots during playback.

You piqued my curiosity... How did you get a copy a month before release date?

I am downloading, just to see...
